wikipedia_page.main: Raymond James "Ray" Smith (born 18 April 1943) is an English former footballer who played as a centre forward. He scored 123 goals from 347 appearances in the Football League playing for Southend United – for whom he top-scored in the 1966–67 season – Wrexham and Peterborough United. He also played for Bangor City.
